c74object.name: sadam.onebang
c74object.description:
sadam.onebang
will output a bang after it received at least one bang on each but its rightmost inlet. The rightmost inlet reset the object to its initial state. When initalized with only one Control Inlet, the object's behaviour is (almost) identical to the onebang object.

inlet.name: INLET_NAME
inlet.digest: (bang/anything) Control Inlets with internal state. The internal state will be set to 1 when a bang (or anything else) arrives.

outlet.name: OUTLET_NAME
outlet.digest: (bang) When all Control Inlets are 1, a Bang is Sent Out.

objarg.name: number of Control Inlets
objarg.description: Sets the number of Control Inlets. Default is 1.

method.name: bang
method.digest: In Control Inlets: Sets internal state to 1. If all internal states are 1, a bang is sent out if a bang has been received in the rightmost inlet since the last bang was sent out.
method.description:
In Control Inlets: Sets internal state to 1. If all internal states are 1, a bang is sent out if a bang has been received in the rightmost inlet since the last bang was sent out.
In the rightmost inlet: Resets the internal states of the Control Inlets to 0.

method.name: int
method.digest: In either inlet: Same as a bang.
